channel.title: digital agency | designed by artificial intelligence
channel.description: digital agency | designed by artificial intelligence

item.title: Micro-moments Archives - Digital Agency
item.description:
Micro-moments Archives - Digital Agency

Google's annual "A Year in Search" retrospective is a chance to look back on the trends that defined the year. And it's a reminder that in moments of need, no matter how big or small, people turn to Google and YouTube. See what this means for marketers.

item.title: Digital Agency PTY LTD
item.description:
Digital Agency PTY LTD

Digital Agency is a new company specialising in measurable digital marketing with Google Adwords™ and Google Analytics™ Digital Agency is specifically geared towards helping Australian Nonprofits thrive with Google™ Ad Grants via Google for Nonprofits and SMBs harness the power of Google to connect with customers with immediacy and relevance in the moments that matter.

item.title: Display Benchmarks Tool - Think with Google
item.description:
Display Benchmarks Tool - Think with Google

Want to understand how your display campaigns compare to those across the rest of the ad industry? This tool lets you pull up-to-date industry benchmarks such as click-through rate, interaction rate and time, expansion rate and video completions by country, vertical, ad size and ad format.

item.title: Google Trends - Think with Google
item.description:
Google Trends - Think with Google

Are searches for your brand increasing over time? Are consumers searching for you or your competitor? Learn about your brand with this tool.

item.title: 5 Ways Consumers Connect to Stores With Mobile Shopping
item.description:
5 Ways Consumers Connect to Stores With Mobile Shopping

Whether you're a global brand or the shop around the corner, the shift to mobile is changing your customers' behavior in and out of the store. Here, we share five insights into how brands can connect meaningfully with people in real time, in all of their micro-moments.

item.title: Mobile in the Purchase Journey - Think with Google
item.description:
Mobile in the Purchase Journey - Think with Google

What is the role of the smartphone in the consumer journey? Explore the data anyway you like through this interactive tool.

item.title: New Data Shows Online Video Ads Drive Consideration, Favorability, Purchase Intent, and Sales
item.description:
New Data Shows Online Video Ads Drive Consideration, Favorability, Purchase Intent, and Sales

Online video can be much more than an awareness driver. New research shows that YouTube not only drives brand metrics throughout the consumer journey-from consideration and favorability to purchase intent-but also boosts potential for positive return on ad spend compared to TV.
